details:
crypto: hisilicon/sec - fix the aead software fallback for engine

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit 5c1149e2abe0b7489300736b8277b45b113de67f, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 6c46a3297beae4ae2d22b26da5e091f058381c7c. For more details please see the references link.
